mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_idx, userid, userpw, nickname, username, phonenumber, email, address, reg_date, auth, enabled) VALUES (seq_member_idx.nextval, #{userid}, #{userpw}, #{nickname}, #{username}, #{phonenumber}, #{email}, #{address}, SYSDATE, 'USER', '0')
mapper.select: SELECT member_idx, userid, userpw, nickname, username, phonenumber, email, address, reg_date, auth, enabled FROM MEMBER WHERE userid=#{userid} AND userpw=#{userpw}
SELECT userid, userpw, auth FROM member WHERE userid = #{userid}
